taxon_identification.taxon_hierarchy: family rosaceae;tribe rubeae;genus rubus;subgenus eubatus;section tholiformes;species schoolcraftianus;

treatment.description: Strongly resembling no. 113, but with stouter and broad-based (5 mm. wide at base) prickles; leaves pilose on veins beneath; terminal leaflet more than half as broad as long; pedicels spreading-pilose, the longer ones 2.5 cm. long.
treatment.habitat_elevation_distribution_or_ecolog: Woods and borders of swamps, s. Mich.
